description: '''Aldo Vargas''', known by his stage name '''Aldo Ranks''', is a Panamanian musician of [[reggae en Espa√±ol]]. From 1992 to 1998, he was the most outstanding and youngest rapper in Panama,{{citation needed|date=June 2012}} supported by producers such as [[El Chombo]] and DJ Pablito on albums such as ''Cuentos de la Cripta'' ("Tales from the Crypt") and ''La Mafia''. Ranks later joined the label Panama Music.
